div.p: ANTONIO: Okay, so by this point, we know low-risk choices are the key to preventing impairment problems. Now some of us might look for other ways to avoid problems.
ANTONIO: Michelle, what do you think? Is there a way to make high-risk choices every now and then and stay clear of problems?
MICHELLE: Well Antonio, high-risk is high-risk. And believing there are "loopholes," or ways around that, can actually increase our risk for problems.
